title: Application form - Marianne Initiative for Human Rights Defenders - Class of 2025 (January-July 2025)
description:
Use this form to apply to take part in the Marianne Initiative welcome and support programme from January to July 2025.

The Marianne initiative for human rights defenders aims to provide better support for human rights defenders in their fight (www.initiativemarianne.fr). 

The hosting programme in France provides for an accommodation near Paris, the payment of a monthly grant to cover daily needs, a training programme, support, and networking with Human Rights Defenders for a period of 6 months. After the 6 months, participants no longer benefit from the grant, the accommodation and the support provided in the programme.

Participation is individual and does not provide for the laureate to be accompanied by their family.

champDescriptors.label: Presentation of the Marianne Initiative
champDescriptors.description:
The Marianne Initiative for Human Rights Defenders aims to better support Human Rights Defenders in their fight (www.initiativemarianne.fr/en/). 

The hosting programme in France provides for individual accommodation near Paris, a monthly grant to cover daily needs, personalised support, and networking with Human Rights Defenders for a period of 6 months. 

The programme does not provide for a support beyond 6 months.

champDescriptors.label: Present your commitment to Human Rights, specifying your objectives, the time devoted to it until now, the actions carried out.
champDescriptors.description: (max. 1,000 words)

champDescriptors.description:
•	Documents attesting to your struggle for Human Rights (press article, website, report, certificate from a third party natural or legal person, award, or nomination for exemplary activism, etc.) ;
•	Copy of your professional card if relevant (lawyer's card, journalist's card, etc.)

champDescriptors.label: Explain the reasons for your application and the prospects you expect from participating in the Marianne Initiative programme and the personal project you wish to develop.
champDescriptors.description:
•	What are yours expected objectives and results for the programme ? 
•	What skills do you wish to develop as part of the programme ? 
•	What specific project do you wish to carry out throughout the programme? 
•	Which activities of the Marianne Initiative particularly caught for attention and why ?

(max. 1,000 words)

champDescriptors.label: Specify your existing links with French or international Human Rights organisations (max. 500 words).
Indicate the meetings you would like to have with French or international Human Rights organisations (maximum 10 meetings).
champDescriptors.description: Please note: The feasibility of these meetings is not fully assured.

champDescriptors.label: Please describe any security risks you face or may be facing as part of your commitment of human rights (max. 500 words).
champDescriptors.description:
•	Are you facing security risks in your work ?
    o	If so, what reasons ? 
    o	How do they affect your activities ? 
•	Could the programme reduce these risks ? 
•	Please specify the type of threats, the perpetrators, and any evidence.

champDescriptors.label: Please note: Your participation in the Initiative Marianne programme must not compromise the safety of your entourage, as their protection cannot be guaranteed. If this is the case, please reconsider your application.
Documents attesting to safety risks (if relevant).
Please provide contact information (phone number and/or e-mail address) for at least two reference persons who can support your application.
champDescriptors.description: These reference persons should be familiar with your Human Rights work, whether at local, national, or international level, and be able to attest to this to the Marianne Initiative if necessary. Please provide their telephone numbers and/or e-mail addresses so that these people can be contacted. These reference persons must be able to express themselves in French, English or Spanish.

champDescriptors.label: Is there any specific information in your application that should be kept confidential?
champDescriptors.description:
If so, the Marianne Initiative will not disclose any personal information to any party outside the Initiative. 

For more information on our confidentiality practices, or if you wish to make a complaint, please contact us by email using the contact form on the www.initiativemarianne.fr website. Applications must be submitted via the Démarches Simplifiées platform.

champDescriptors.label: Are you willing to speak publicly about your experience or the Human Rights situation in your country ?
champDescriptors.description: Public speaking is not a requirement to take part to the programme.

champDescriptors.label: Please indicate any additional information that is important for the consideration of your application.
Is participation in the programme and the availability it implies (from January to early July 2025) fully compatible with your personal and professional situation?
champDescriptors.description: Please note: It is possible to continue your professional activity as long as this does not prevent you from participating in the programme diligently (see e.g.: example of a typical week in the Appendix Practical information notice). Attendance is a prerequisite for participation in the programme and payment of the monthly grant.

champDescriptors.label: NOTE:
champDescriptors.description:
Only complete application files and submitted wia this form will be examined. 

All applications will be followed by an assessment before acceptance into the programme. The 2025 promotion will welcome arounf fifteen laureates. 

Additional questions may be asked if necessary by contacting you by e-mail. 

Only the selected applicants will be informed of their selection, which will take place in October.
